abstract: ConAgra Foods reports steep first-quarter loss of $1.2 billion, compared with profits of $482.3 million in period year before; vows to increase marketing budgets and revive brands in effort to stem fall.
lead_paragraph: The company lost $1.2 billion, or $2.88 a share, compared with profits of $482.3 million, or $1.14 a share, in the period last year..

headline.main: ConAgra Reports $1.2 Billion Quarterly Loss as Overhaul Continues
headline.print_headline: ConAgra Reports $1.2 Billion Quarterly Loss and Vows to Increase Marketing

snippet: The company lost $1.2 billion, or $2.88 a share, compared with profits of $482.3 million, or $1.14 a share, in the period last year..
